articles.title: SoftBank-backed Unacademy cuts monthly burn down to a fourth, eyes breakeven by January - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Unacademy has slashed its monthly burn to Rs 50-60 crore from more than Rs 200 crore previously, sources said requesting anonymity. This has come on the back of various measures that it undertook as funding slowed down and investors turned cautious.
